mapper.select: select name,id,dept_id as deptId from dj_partymember where dept_id = #{deptId} order by party_post_code asc
select name,id,dept_id as deptId,-1 as status from dj_partymember where dept_id = #{deptId} order by party_post_code asc

SELECT pm.id,pm. NAME,(SELECT sum(score) FROM dj_score sc WHERE sc.dj_sub_type_id in(51,52) AND sc.add_year = #{year} AND sc.user_id = pm.id) AS score FROM dj_partymember pm WHERE pm.dept_id = #{deptId}
select pm.id,pm.name,ifnull((SELECT sum(score) FROM dj_score sc WHERE sc.user_id = pm.id and sc.add_year = #{year}),0) as totalScore from dj_partymember pm where pm.id =#{id}
SELECT (SELECT sum(score) FROM dj_score sc WHERE sc.add_year = #{year} AND sc.user_id = pm.id) AS score FROM dj_partymember pm WHERE pm.idcard = #{idCard}

select pm.id,pm.name,pm.sex_code as sexCode,pm.age, ifnull((select sum(score) from dj_score sc where sc.user_id = pm.id and sc.add_year =#{year}),0) as totalScore from dj_partymember pm where pm.dept_id = #{deptId} order by pm.party_post_code

select pm.id,pm.name,pm.dept_id as deptId,u.name as userName,pm.sex_code as sexCode, pm.age,pm.phone,pm.email, pm.idcard,pm.birth_date as birthDate,pm.education_code as educationCode,pm.party_post_code as partyPostCode from dj_partymember pm left join dj_user u on u.id = pm.id where pm.id = #{id}
select id,name,idcard,dept_id from dj_partymember where idcard = #{idcard}
